topic.title: Discuss (U5): The Great Lakes
topic.text:
Living in the Great Lakes Region, we are most fortunate that we have access to one of the largest bodies of accessible fresh water in the world. The Great Lakes are an international resource shared between the U.S., Canada and Native American Tribes.

Given worldwide issues with water access:

  • Pull from this weeks resources and explain whether you think The Great Lakes are in danger of diminishing due to decreased precipitation and/or overuse (e.g. possibly from selling water rights to other areas)?

Initial Posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59 pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at lest two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59 pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
